data.title: Girl's Day Members Profile (Updated!)
data.meta_description: Our Girl's Day Members Profile is updated on a regular basis, providing up to date facts and news.
data.text:
Girl’s Day Members Profile and Facts:

Girl’s Day (걸스데이) currently consists of 4 members: Sojin, Yura, Minah, and Hyeri. The band debuted in 2010, under Dream Tea Entertainment. On January 11, 2019 all 4 members of Girl’s Day contracts with Dream T Entertainment expired and they decided not to renew. Dream T Ent announced that the group didn’t disband, but is just in hiatus and there are still hopes the members will promote again as Girl’s Day in the future.

Girl’s Day Official Fandom Name: DAI5Y (Daisy)

Girl’s Day Official Fandom Color: N/A

Girl’s Day Official SNS:

Instagram: @dte_girlsday

X (Twitter): @girls_day

Facebook: dai5y.gsd

Fan Cafe: Girlsday5

Girl’s Day Member Profiles:

Sojin

Stage Name: Sojin (소진)

Birth Name: Park So Jin (박소진)

Position: Leader, Lead Vocalist

Birth Date: May 21st, 1986

Zodiac Sign: Gemini

Height: 166 cm (5’5″)

Weight: 49.5 kg (109 lbs)

Blood Type: AB

MBTI Type: INFJ

Nationality: Korean

Instagram: @ssozi_sojin

X (Twitter): @girls_day_sojin

Sojin Facts:

– She was born in Daegu, South Korea.

– Education: Lee Hyun Elementary School, Seojin Middle School, Kyungduk Girls’ High School, Yeungnam University (Major in Mechanical Engineering).

– Before debuting, she was a vocal trainer for the K-pop boy band Ulala Session.

– She was part of the initial members and debuted with Girl’s Day in 2010.

– In January 2011, Sojin released her first solo single “Our Love Like This”, which was the OST for the “Flames of Desire” Korean drama.

– Sojin composed Girl’s Day’ songs “Telepathy”, “Girl’s Day World”, “Let’s Go”, and co-wrote the lyrics for “I Don’t Mind”.

– She also helped compose the song “It’s Snowing” for Tokyo Girl.

– She loves cleaning, browsing YouTube for interesting videos, shopping, and eating snacks

– She is good at playing the piano and calligraphy

– On January 11, 2019 Sojin’s contract with Dream Tea Ent. expired and she decided to not renew.

– On March 19, 2019 she signed a contract with Noon Company.

– She married on November 18, 2023 to Lee Dongha. (source)

– Sojin’s Ideal Type: “I like the kind of men who are thoughtful, but are still a little stubborn. I don’t really look at appearance. If I do, I like people with big mouths. I also usually look at their eyes/gaze. Height doesn’t matter at all.”

Show more Sojin fun facts…

Yura

Stage Name: Yura (유라)

Birth Name: Kim Ah Young (김아영)

Position: Main Rapper, Lead Dancer, Vocalist, Visual

Birth Date: November 6th, 1992

Zodiac Sign: Scorpio

Height: 170 cm (5’7″)

Weight: 52 kg (114 lbs)

Blood Type: O

MBTI Type: ENFJ

Nationality: Korean

Instagram: @yura_936

X (Twitter): @girls_day_yura

Yura Facts:

– Yura was born in Ulsan, South Korea.

– Education: Ulsan Art High School (Dance major), Dongduk Women’s University (alongside Minah).

– She loves dancing and listening to music.

– She’s good at painting.

– According to “One Fine Day”, Yura’s height is now 170 cm (5’7″).

– According to Sojin “Yura has a huge interest in investment. She is the real rich girl.” (tvN’s “Taxi”)

– Yura revealed that she is an owner of a building in Ulsan. (tvN’s “Taxi”)

– In 2014, Yura joined “We Got Married”, where she was paired with actor Hong Jong Hyun.

– In 2016, Yura was chosen as an MCs for “Tasty Road”, in 2017, she was chosen as one of the new MCs for “Life Bar”, in 2017 she was also chosen as a cast member of the show “Insolent Housemates”.

– Yura insured her legs for 500 million won (about 448 thousand dollars).

– Yura joined Girl’s Day in September 2010, alongside Hyeri, when Jiin and Jisun left the group.

– On January 11, 2019 Yura’s contract with Dream Tea Ent. expired and she decided to not renew.

– On March 20, 2019 is was announced that Yura joined Awesome ENT.

– Yura’s Ideal Type: A man who is attentive, has a sense of humor and likes her. She mentioned before Lee Seung Gi as her ideal type.

Show more Yura fun facts…

Minah

Stage Name: Minah (민아)

Birth Name: Bang Min Ah (방민아)

Position: Main Vocalist

Birth Date: May 13th, 1993

Zodiac Sign: Taurus

Height: 164 cm (5’4″)

Weight: 47 kg (103 lbs)

Blood Type: O

MBTI Type: I/ENFJ

Nationality: Korean

Instagram: @bbang_93

X (Twitter): @girls_day_minah

YouTube: Minah 민아

Minah Facts:

– She was born in Incheon, South Korea.

– Minah has an older sister, which is also an idol – Wanna.B’s Linah.

– Education: Jinsun Girls’ High School, Dongduk Women’s University (majoring in Broadcasting).

– She was part of the initial members and debuted with Girl’s Day in 2010.

– Minah was a cast member of “Law of the Jungle” season 5 (2015).

– In March 2015, Minah made her solo debut with the album “I Am a Woman Too”.

– She’s good at playing the piano and impersonating Lena Park.

– Minah has an excavator license. (“Knowing Brother” Ep. 68)

– Minah is the only member living in Gangnam (a very expensive neighborhood in Seoul).

– She also acted in the movies “Holly” (2013), “Dad for Rent” (2014).

– Minah is friends with Hotshot’s/JBJ’s Noh Taehyun.

– Minah dated Tottenham’s soccer player Son Heungmin from 2014 to 2015.

– On January 11, 2019 Minah’s contract with Dream Tea Ent. expired and she decided to not renew.

– In March 2019, Minah signed with Yooborn Entertainment.

–- Minah’s Ideal Type: She said D.O. (EXO) is her Ideal type.

Show more Minah fun facts…

Hyeri

Stage Name: Hyeri (혜리)

Birth Name: Lee Hye Ri (이혜리)

Position: Main Dancer, Lead Rapper, Vocalist, Face of the Group, Maknae

Birth Date: June 9th, 1994

Zodiac Sign: Gemini

Height: 167 cm (5’6″)

Weight: 54 kg (119 lbs)

Blood Type: AB

MBTI Type: ESFJ

Nationality: Korean

Instagram: hyeri_0609

X (Twitter): girls_day_hyeri

Hyeri Facts:

– She was born in Gwangju, South Korea.

– She has a younger sister, Hye-rim (2 years younger).

– Hyeri was scouted by Dream Tea Entertainment when she was in middle school.

– Education: Seoul School of Performing Arts, Konkuk University (Film major)

– She joined Girl’s Day in September 2010, alongside Yura, when Jiin and Jisun left the group.

– According to the members, Hyeri is the highest paid member of Girl’s Day. (Tvn’s “Taxi”)

– She likes watching movies and reading books.

– She’s good at running marathons and writing.

– In 2016, on the Lunar New Year, Hyeri donated ₩50 million to Community Chest of Korea in order to help improving elderly welfare.

– Hyeri is best friends with Rosé (BLACKPINK). (source: Amazing Saturday)

– Hyeri was in a relationship with H.O.T‘s member Tony An (started in March 2013) but they broke up after 8 months.

– Since August 2017, Hyeri is dating Ryu Jun Yeol (they were both lead actor/actress in “Reply 1988”).

– On January 11, 2019 Hyeri’s contract with Dream Tea Ent. expired and she decided to not renew.

– On April 30, 2019 Hyeri revealed to have signed exclusive contract with Creative group ING.

– Hyeri’s Ideal Type: A man who can take good care of her.

Show more Hyeri fun facts…

Former Members:

Jisun

Stage Name: Jisun (지선)

Birth Name: Hwang Jisun (황지선)

Position: Lead Vocalist, Sub-Rapper

Birthday: October 17th, 1989

Zodiac Sign: Libra

Height: 165 cm (5’5″)

Weight: 46 kg (101 lbs)

Blood Type: A

MBTI Type: N/A

Nationality: Korean

Instagram: @jiseoniya

Jisun Facts:

– Her hobbies are stretching, reading, & dancing.

– Education: Keukdong College.

– She left Girl’s Day in September 2010, to pursue individual activities.

– Jisun joined New F.O in 2011 but the group disbanded.

– She was a member of S#aFLA, under VINE Entertainment.

– On May 6, 2022 Tango Music, U-Kiss‘ current agency, announced that U-Kiss Hoon is getting married to Hwang Jisun.

– The couple married on May 29, 2022. The couple then welcomed their first son on January 2, 2024.

Jiin

Stage Name: Jiin (지인)

Real Name: Lee Jiin (이지인)

Position: Main Vocalist

Birthday: March 13th, 1992

Zodiac Sign: Pisces

Height: 167 cm (5’6″)

Weight: 45 kg (99 lbs)

Blood Type: O

MBTI Type: N/A

Nationality: Korean

Instagram: @s2._.hyerii

YouTube: 혜리케인 [HYERICANE]

Jiin Facts:

– Her hobbies are cooking, listening to music, watching movies.

– Education: Anyang Art High School.

– She left Girl’s Day in September 2010, to pursue individual activities.

– December 26, 2012 Jihae and Jiin released a song, “Loving Day”.

– Jiin went on to join Bebop in 2014 but left in 2016.

– She participated on “I Can See Your Voice”.

– Jiin is now a trot singer under the name Jang Hyeri.

Jihae

Stage Name: Jihae (지해)

Birth Name: Woo Ji Hae (우지해)

Position: Main Dancer, Main Rapper

Birthday: May 14th, 1989

Zodiac Sign: Taurus

Height: 160 cm (5’2”)

Height: 47 kg (103)

Blood Type: B

MBTI Type: N/A

Nationality: Korean

X (Twitter): @enoughjihye

Jihae Facts:

– Hobbies: Dancing both traditional Korean dance and modern dance, doing ballet, and going hiking or rock-climbing.

– On October 17, 2012 it was announced that Jihae left the group for personal reasons.

– On December 26, 2012 Jihae and Jiin released the song, “Loving Day”.

Note: Please don’t copy-paste the content of this page to other sites on the web. If you use info from our profile, kindly put a link to this post. Thanks! – KProfiles.com

Note 2: Hyeri updated her height to 54kg: Source.
